name: Krelm's Buff Bracers
flavorText: “Twas hitherto eons past from whence Krelm the Immodest didst thitherward dash forth upon the Blazing Wastes clad only in his bogodile skin belt and bracers to face the loathsome Oglak beast and slew him thence mightily with nigh but his bare hands thereupon.” -Excerpt from Stories Meant to Frighten Small Children
flavorTextHtml: “Twas hitherto eons past from whence Krelm the Immodest didst thitherward dash forth upon the Blazing Wastes clad only in his bogodile skin belt and bracers to face the loathsome Oglak beast and slew him thence mightily with nigh but his bare hands thereupon.” -Excerpt from Stories Meant to Frighten Small Children

secondary.textHtml: You are immune to Knockback and Stun effects.
secondary.text: You are immune to Knockback and Stun effects.
